modName: Ancient Shrouded Cowl fix for SkyRe
summary: SkyRe reintroduces a bug where the Ancient Shrouded Cowl is not shown on Argonian and Kajiit characters this simply fix that, just put it after ReProccer.esp in your load order.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-1-1381771901.png[/img][/center]
SkyRe reintroduces a bug where the Ancient Shrouded Cowl is not shown on Argonian and Kajiit characters this simply fix that.

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-3-1381877974.png[/img][/center]
Download and activate using NMM and put it after ReProccer.esp in your load order.

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-1-1381878016.png[/img][/center]
Deactivate and remove using NMM

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-5-1381877974.png[/img][/center]
THIS MOD NEEDS SKYRE TO WORK, IF YOU DON'T HAVE IT THE GAME WILL CRASH.
Download it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286//?]here[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2192278/?tb=mods&pUp=1][center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40952-2-1381878017.png[/img][/center][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2192278/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods.[/url]
author: Akezhar
